short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Support adding additional HTTP headers to every requests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An open source project help you easily custom your HTTP headers.
Go to option page of extension, put your customer header and its value then save.
Enjoy customizing :)
